title: PBE IN OCEANIA SERVERS
body: Now since we are able to grab a PBE account I feel like there is enough room for an Oceanic PBE Server to come up. So that us in Australia and New Zealand can experience it in a better form than 300 ms

replies.body: You should be just grateful they included OCE to partake in PBE testing. Their office thingy is based in America and they aren't going to change anytime soon or add one in OCE I dont think.
Ping is so high, if you can’t join in the game first time, you won’t join in the whole match
i think its just too unplayable
No lol its only NA so koreans and china have to deal with it too :/
